sentence: Other members include Tim Ryan, D-Ohio, and Chuck Fleischmann, R-Tenn. Their goal is to “talk about high tech ideas of how to secure our border,” Gonzalez told Border Report recently at his offices in McAllen, Texas.
author: Sandra Sanchez
title: New congressional caucus formed to study border security technology

sentence: Another ad released by Democratic Representative, Tim Ryan — who is also running for the open Senate seat — has been called out for stoking anti-Asian sentiment.
author: DeArbea Walker
title: Ohio US Senate candidates called out for racist campaign ads: "Do you hate Mexicans?"

sentence: Ohio Rep. Tim Ryan, the leading Democrat in an open-seat Senate race, has co-sponsored a bill that would prevent the Biden administration from what he calls a "wrong and reckless" decision to lift the Title 42 restrictions.
author: Eric Bradner
title: Swing-state Democrats turn on Biden over Title 42 border decision
